pullrequest.title: Added atlas version 4 with no wry2 joints

content.raw:
Because the BDI behavior library won't work without it, see #467 and #475.

We now work around this by using different robot descriptions for spawning drcsim and our onboard software and adjusting our controller software accordingly. Some of that is accessible in https://github.com/team-vigir/vigir_gazebo/tree/separate_gazebo_robot_description/vigir_atlas_gazebo_launch/launch

/edit: Meant to be a reply to John's post above, apologies for using wrong button :)
